ExampleLocation.name: The Rusty Tankard Tavern
ExampleLocation.full_description: A cozy medieval tavern with warm lighting and rough-hewn wooden beams. The common room is filled with round tables, and a large stone fireplace dominates one wall. Adventurers and locals mingle over mugs of ale.

description_components.architecture: Two-story timber-frame building, thatched roof, small diamond-paned windows, creaky wooden floorboards
description_components.atmosphere: Warm and welcoming, filled with conversation and laughter, smell of roasting meat and spilled ale
description_components.lighting: Warm golden light from oil lamps and crackling fireplace, shadows dancing in corners
description_components.key_features: Large stone fireplace with iron cooking pot, long wooden bar with brass taps, mounted hunting trophies on walls
